title: Error@failed to create dump file error 183
body:
getting this 3/5 champ selects and costs me LP because of not being able to get back in game fast enough to lock in, have mailed riot various times and been ignored, great you made a new client that looks good but ever since it was released its been nothing but buggy. this has been an issue with peoples clients for months. i have tested and its nothing to do with connection issues as some rioter suggested on another thread. If you dont have a fix for this bug then disable queue dodge timers and lp loss from dodge until you actually deliver a client that does what it was made for and actually get you in a game

THANKS

replies.body: That error "failed to create dump file" is actually an error coming from the Bugplat message because the client crashed and it's trying to tell you why. You should have seen a different more specific error message from the Bugsplat, but that ended up having an error as well which caused this dump file message. Let's try running a quick repair through the client options, and if that doesn't work let me know so we can dig a little deeper.

i get the same message over and over again...
its hard 2 climb when u get kicked out in 50% of all champ selects in rank.
I checked all my drivers, updated, let repair toolts work... nothing changed, the same message over and over again... frustrating, that riot made it that way for some players. If i only could downgrade it ...
